title: BRIEF-Evolve Education Group Completes Acquisition Of Childcare Centres In Melbourne
text:
BRIEF-Evolve Education Group Completes Acquisition Of Childcare Centres In Melbourne

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 12:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Evolve Education Group Completes Acquisition Of Childcare Centres In Melbourne Oct 8 (Reuters) - Evolve Education Group Ltd : * COMPLETES ACQUISITION OF 4 CHILDCARE CENTRES IN MELBOURNE * DEAL FOR AU$11.8M * CENTRES SEEN TO CONTRIBUTE AU$10.8M IN ANNUALISED REVENUE AND AU$2.5M IN ANNUALISED EBIT FOR EVOLVE EDUCATION GROUP.

BRIEF-Evolve Education Group Completes Acquisition Of Childcare Centres In Melbourne
